Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Marios P
Reviews.Content: rome 5 days stayed embassy hotel hotel harmony romes atmosphere sophisticated simple close centre rome access famous sites easy spacious warm bed quality preserved clean staff polite eager help questions information city breakfast delicious continental breakfast described website truly enjoyed stay embassy hotel strongly recommend

Reviews.Title: “How on earth did this hostile dump earn 3 stars?”

Reviews.Content: reviewers talked rude staff thinking stayed omg changing front desk personnel miserable helpful unnecessarily rude breakfast staff lousy breakfast hour closing baskets empty pitchers empty told alll gone shower measured exactly 26 26 quick drastically changed water temp travellers accomodating unusual circumstances free internet floor 3rd floor simply shrug dont reported 1 star generous hotel 3 star rating

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a good area in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Mkettune
Reviews.Content: im finnish school teacher travelled rome 15 students college wife stayed embassy 11 nights hotel perfect staff helpful loved enthusiastic atmosphere hotel location hotel hotel isnt center city found nearby awesome restaurants food stores hotel situated near central railway station termini recommend you´re embassy visit via nearby street locates ice cream bars rome caruso ice cream tasted florence ago gelateria near bridge chose chocolate perfect match bit salty taste sweetness chocolate nearby via locates cheese store visited tasted warm self mozzarella blew minds recommend try surprised romeo local humidity usually nearer 60 cent optimal 72 cent

Reviews.Content: hotel 5 mins walk main termini station excellent whilst central hotel 20 mins walk main locations found staff extremely friendly free internet access travellers laptops breakfast basic served purpose clean tidy shower ensuite recommend independent travellers dont mind stroll main

Reviews.Title: “Don't let first appearances put you off”
